about.operator: Single pool operater from California, USA. Enterprise Solutions Enginer specializing in systems infrastructure and security. Happy to contribute to Cardano Community and contribute to SPO tools.
about.server: Mostly bare metal hardware powered with solar and green energy. Currently running 1 Block Producer and 4 Relay Nodes, all with 64GB-128GB of RAM and high core counts. Block Producer node, 1 Relay, and 1 Mithril Signer connected via 40Gigabit local network and 1 Gigabit Fiber Internet connection. 2 additional regional relays with Gigabit Internet connectoin. 1 cloud relay with 10 Gigabit Internet connectoin. Extreme low latency stake pool infrastructure.
